entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:44 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 18 by morning. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 08:44 AM CST Wednesday 28 December 2022
